post.body: congrats on all your hard work—looking forward to Connect!
they would all look different because you'd customize online like this http://bit.ly/RNHe
yeah, I'd prefer it were $10—or free!
actually, it does sms too so it could probably work with twitter—I'm going to get one and find out!
you should upload a profile pic for twitter and you can do that here: http://twitter.com/account/picture
Yes, we'll see you at La Boheme—reminds me of Moonstruck: "My brother has his hand, my brother has his girl!"
cool, thanks. It's not that big of a deal but maybe I'll stop by a store next week
wildcare http://www.wildcarebayarea.org/site/PageServer
Supporting the great ape protection act by drinking beer and writing letters at a pub
following @USAT_Breaking which is breaking news by the folks at USA Today—consider it a trial subscription!
following @greggrunberg who plays Parkman on Heroes—he shares twitpics from the set!
Learning about sake in the sake museum
Hanging around in Oakland today
the initial reaction to my luggage idea is negative—what can I say, it was the idea I woke up with this morning!
Idea: standardized luggage passengers must buy or lease from the airline—more efficient for fuel and a revenue source
I took this photo today and tonight I made it my desktop background http://flickr.com/photos/biz/3069162491/
watching a victor borge special on PBS—I am an 80 year old man
About to see slumdog millionaire with @Livia
feeling inspired by @THE_REAL_SHAQ and his tweets—the guy is funny, he has a big heart, and he's very down-to-earth—I'm a fan!
NYT reports Wal-Mart Employee Trampled to Death by Customers http://bit.ly/bk8n
Twitter license plate spotted in the wild! http://flickr.com/photos/biz/3065208030/
Checking out the Peek—this thing is cool, I want to get it for my little sister for christmas https://www.getpeek.com
Preparing the tofurky!
There is a huge line outside cafe gratitude today -- makes sense
wondering what @goldman thinks about my Oxford debate skills—he taught me everything I know
Here's the video of the Oxford Union Debate I participated in 2 weeks ago: http://bit.ly/oWRL (I'm 38 minutes in)
"I don't think you're a gold digga', just don't understand that last twitta'" --Stephen F***ing Colbert
trying some sheese that @livia ordered from Food Fight—pretty good! http://store.foodfightgrocery.com/sheese.html
some family drama tonight and it's on @livia's side for a change—the holidays have officially arrived!
we bumped into @jack and @gayatri at the opera but no @sarahm and it was the best opera this season in my opinion
At the San francisco opera and it's crowded -- forgot how popular la boheme is!
scarfing down a fresh everything bagel and listening to Stephen Colbert's Christmas album
Going for a jog before dinner
Had a good Trazzler strategy session this morning with @adam now I gotta crank this weekend update out to the Twitter team before a run
Watching Heroes
super jingle brothers! http://bit.ly/tRyb
Global Voices has an interesting article about Twitter being used during the elections in Ghana http://bit.ly/oF42
had drinks with @stevenbjohnson tonight and confessed to borrowing a lot from Emergence for my last book
we left the twitter holiday party just as the karaoke started because @livia is allergic to karaoke
Twitter holiday party is about to start--let the festivities begin!
The San Jose Mercury News is looking for Twitterers who plan to attend the inauguration http://www.mercurynews.com/ci_11197189
At the nutcracker -- good seats!
There's a Salmonella Outbreak killing Bay Area Songbirds but there's something easy we can do to curb the spread: http://bit.ly/ddxW
Wow, @jimmyfallon is twittering like crazy—FOLLOWING!
Elephant pharmacy in Berkeley offers 10% discount on anything purchased before 10am -- interesting idea
finding my flip camcorder in a cluttered closet—maybe I'll use this thing!
this year the twitter office has become a whole bunch of elves: http://beanelf.org/
about to have dinner with a good friend in the east village -- starving!
congratulations to StockTwits, a Twitter API project that just closed almost $1M in funding: http://bit.ly/u4ff
Having a soy latte in soho before meeting with some folks
there's snow here -- brr
having dinner with @livia before heading to SFO to catch a plane to NYC with @shellen
Didn't mean to cause such a fuss, we're integrating with Google, Facebook, and MySpace (eventually) http://bit.ly/jllF
Twitter has been welcomed into the Google Friend Connect family: http://bit.ly/TkyA
Chowing down at my neighbors annual latke fest
"The woods would be very silent if no birds sang except those that sang best." -Henry van Dyke
I'm working at a Starbucks and @afinefrenzy just came on the speakers—more precisely "You Picked Me" from One Cell in The Sea
Me last night: Hey, I like your outfit. It looks like you went into a thrift store and said, 'I'll take it.' Who am I, Don Rickles?
Last night I dreamed that @zappos had decided to provide customer service for Manhattan—just, in general. Call up, get answers.
The world's official timekeepers have added an extra second to 2008 http://bit.ly/3pOBRE make it count!
Wondering if Ms. Pac Man is actually Pac Man's sister--same last name but not married. Requires investigation.
I've been bitten by this no sound bug on the MacBook Air—anyone successfully solve it? http://bit.ly/Y3cR
Checking out Tweebay—buy and sell your stuff using Twitter: http://www.tweebay.com/
"Using Twitter/Tipjoy, everyone who participates is both a donor and a broadcaster." http://bit.ly/wellwishes
Watching the grinch -- roast beast is a feast I can't stand in the least
TweetUplift happens tomorrow at Venice Beach in LA—will you be part of helping out the homeless? More info: http://bit.ly/tweetuplift
"The Night Before Twitmas" by David Niall Wilson http://bit.ly/twitmas
debating the usefulness of having business cards created for Twitter employees—maybe it's too old fashioned?
Don't worry, Twitter is prepared in case of emergency http://twitpic.com/vu57
Sweet, my I <3 Twitter button arrived from Etsy! http://bit.ly/XZSd
Digg has created a bunch of Twitter accounts that update when enough folks vote: http://bit.ly/suX5
thinking I should start doing twitpics
Looks like @ricksanchezcnn is going to interview @2drinksbehind on CNN at 3pm eastern about twittering the plane crash
Oh boy, I'm following @noradsanta now
after a run in the rain I'm looking forward to dinner and a movie at home—let's see what Comcast has on demand
I visited the Etsy.com offices while I was in Brooklyn last week: http://bit.ly/oEz4
